item.title: 4.1 Introduction
item.description: General main interface # 1. Main menu. 2. Account tree. 3. List of devices. 4. Map 5. The device details box is selected. 6. Extension tool. 7. Map widget. 8. Help. 1. Main menu # Click on Map on the menu. The interface is displayed as shown below : 2.

item.title: 4.2 General Device Monitoring
item.description: General Device Monitoring # 1. Search # 1.1. Searchable by: # Device name IMEI Device group 1.2. Color statistics show the vehicle status of the device # Users who want to know the most specific device status can search by tabs: All, Stop, Run, GPS Weak, Lost Signal. Hide/show - all devices/each device on the map. Add/Remove that device to/out favorites list.

item.title: 4.3 Detailed Monitoring
item.description: Detailed Monitoring # 1. Favorite / Disfavour # Favorite: To find quickly and conveniently track vehicle details that need attention and need to be handled. Step 1: Click on the device. Step 2: Click on in the device info box. The icon will change to . Disfavour: If you have finished processing or do not prioritize the vehicle, you can un-favor it.

item.title: 4.4 Map Tools
item.description: Map Tools # 1. Map setting # Step 1: Enter . Step 2 : The dialog box appears. Settings, enable/disable information as you like. Map type: Chọn giao diện bản đồ sao cho dễ nhìn. Brightness (100%): Chọn độ sáng bản đồ sao cho dễ nhìn. Show cluster: Gộp các xe lại thành một cụm tùy với mức độ zoom bản đồ. Display type Type: Chọn loại hiển thị của thiết bị tương ứng cho dễ nhìn và có thể xem trước lại mục Preview.

item.title: 4.5 Map Widget
item.description: Map Widget # 1. Car color # The color of the vehicle corresponds to the states in the legend . Click to show/hide color information on the map. 2. Status color convention # : Car is running. : Car is stopping. : The car is stopped but the engine is still running. : GPS weak. : GPRS weak.

item.title: 4.6 Route History
item.description: Route History # To view the route history do the following: Step 1: Click on to view your device’s route history. Step 2: View your device’s route history. Can be to hide/show one or more route histories on the map. 1. Search # To search the route history do the following: 1: Click on -> enter the route name and press Enter.

item.title: 4.7 Corridor
item.description: Corridor # To view corridor information do the following: Step 1: Click on to see a list of corridor. Step 2: See the Corridor list. Can be to hide/show one or more corridors on the map. 1. Create new # To create a new corridor, do the following: Step 1 : Click on Create New. Step 2 : Add corridor screen appears:

item.title: 4.8 Geofence
item.description: Geofence # To view area information do the following: Step 1: Click on to see a list of Geofence. Step 2: See the list of geofence. Can be to hide/show one or more geofence on the map. 1. Create new # Step 1: Click on Create new. Step 2: : Select the display type for the map.

item.title: 4.9 Landmark
item.description: Landmark # To view marker information do the following: Step 1: Click on to see a list of Landmark. Step 2: See the list of landmark. Can be to hide/show one or more landmark on the map. 1. Create new # Step 1: Click on Create new Step 2: Name: Enter the landmark name. Type : Select the appropriate landmark type.

item.title: 4.10 Support
item.description: Support # 1. Ticket # To send a request, do the following: Step 1: Click on Support > Ticket Step 2: A dialog box appears: Department: Chọn phòng ban muốn gửi yêu cầu đến. Title: Fill in the required title. Phone number: Enter your phone number so that the support team can easily contact you. Email: Enter your email so that the support team can easily contact you.
